title: Bowman Says Fed Can 'Afford to Take Time' With Rate Cuts
description: Federal Reserve Vice Chair for Supervision Michelle Bowman says she saw merit in waiting to lower rates further given elevated inflation and uncertainty over potential distortions in economic data during an event in Oahu, Hawaii. (This report is audio only.) (Source: Bloomberg)
content: Federal Reserve Vice Chair for Supervision Michelle Bowman says she saw merit in waiting to lower rates further given elevated inflation and uncertainty over potential distortions in economic data during an event in Oahu, Hawaii. (This report is audio only.) (Source: Bloomberg)
